pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, January 24, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, January 24, 2017:

Calgary, Alberta

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Retreat.

Alberta Room
Fairmont Palliser Hotel
133 9 Ave SW
Calgary, Alberta

Note for media:

  • On-site coverage of the cabinet retreat open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained accreditation in advance, please present yourself to the accreditation desk on site.


11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a working lunch with members of the Youth Council.

Closed to media.


1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the family photo and will hold a media availability.

Turner Valley Room
Fairmont Palliser Hotel
133 9 Ave SW
Calgary, Alberta

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media covering the Cabinet Retreat.


7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Jack Simpson Gymnasium
Kinesiology Complex
University of Calgary
121 University Court NW
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 6:00 p.m.
  • Open coverage


Note: All times local
